name: Initial Setup
value:
**1.** [Invite the bot](https://modmail.xyz/invite).
**2.** Run `=setup` in your server.
**3.** Done! :tada:

You can use `=help` for a [list of commands.](https://modmail.xyz/commands)

name: Premium
value:
Please consider purchasing premium for more features!
This includes full conversation logging, custom greeting and closing messages, as well as snippets.

name: Advanced Setup
value: Some additional commands you could use are:

name: `=pingrole <roles>`
value: For configuring which roles get pinged upon a ModMail ticket being created.

name: `=accessrole <roles>`
value: For configuring which roles can reply to ModMail tickets.

name: `=commandonly`
value:
For toggling if commands are required to reply to tickets.
If **disabled** staff have only to type in the channel for their message to be sent.
If **enabled** staff have to reply with `=reply` or `=areply`.

name: `=anonymous`
value:
For toggling anonymous staff replies to hide the responder's name.
This does not work for making your end-user anonymous.

name: `=logging`
value:
For toggling log messages of tickets being opened or closed.
This does not log a transcript of the messages.

name: You can mention the roles, use role IDs or role names.
value: For role names with a space, it needs to be in quotes (e.g. "Head Admin")
